chunk:
Glamnetic Wipe Off, Makeup Remover

Brand: Glamnetic

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: Water (Aqua/​Eau), Glycerin, Sodium Olivate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Phytate, Ethylhexylglycerin

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
